page.title: 09MY HOBBY IS CRICKET.
page.content: My hobby is cricket.I am quite good at it and I go to a club every Friday. The club is at Caythorpe.Friday is for the under 13's and Monday is for the under 15's. I have just about all the equipment. I have 4 bats,3 sets of stumps,5 cricket balls,a pair of pads and gloves,2 boxes and all the whites. At school,after dinner,we often have a little game on the field at the back of the school.I bowl a medium pace with a fairly soft ball and a medium-slow with a cricket ball and I am a fairly low order batsman.I fancy my chances as a bowler rather than a batsman. In the five matches I have played,we have won two and lost 3. Sometimes,at Caythorpe,it is raining so we do nothing.
